name: Google Sign-In API Requests
description: Additional Postman requests for Google Sign-In functionality

exec: console.log('Google Sign-In successful, tokens saved to environment');

request.description: Authenticate user with Google OAuth2 ID token. The idToken should be obtained from Google Sign-In on the frontend.
Access the Google Sign-In demo page for testing

setup: 1. Set up Google OAuth2 credentials in Google Cloud Console
2. Configure your Google Client ID in application.properties
3. Use the demo page or frontend to get a Google ID token
4. Set the googleIdToken environment variable with the obtained token
testing: 4. Copy the ID token from the response
5. Use it in the Postman request
